vsParam:
Wow, there are so many flowers and grass I haven't seen...
Perhaps we can synthesize new medicines with them.

Synthesizing medicines... Are you an alchemist!?
Er...

Ah, I am Ayesha and I am a pharmacist.
I suppose... it can be counted as alchemist.
I know alchemist... but what is a pharmacist?

Yes. In my world, I synthesize
medicines and sell them.
Is it similar to an alchemist?
So you are an expert of medicines!

Yeah... A pharmacist is the person who makes medicines, right?
Actually I am not familiar with alchemy...

Hehe, come to me if you need any medicine.
I can synthesize it in a very short time.

Er, an alchemist also needs to synthesize medicines...
So what's the difference?

Er, Ayesha, you are also an alchemist, right?
Do you want to study in the Academy?

When studying alchemy, perhaps you could find
more differences between pharmacists and alchemists.

Ah, that's right! And Ayesha just came to our world,
she needs a place to stay...

Really? Thank you!
Well, it turns out this world also has alchemy...

Ah, so you came from another world,
how come you are not surprised!

Ah, well. In fact, I am looking for my younger sister
who went missing...

I was careless when searching for clues in the ruin,
and ended up here.

At first, I thought the device in the ruin was activated,
and it sent me to another place. Hee hee...

That, that is astonishing enough!?
you could really take things easy, Ayesha...
Ha ha, many people say that...

Anyway, aren't you looking for your younger sister...
Being sent to another world in such a moment, it's tough.

Ah, about that... I think it is very likely that
my younger sister went to another world just like me.

So, maybe I could run into her somewhere in this world
when I try to find a way back!

I see... Um, we will help you!
Nice to meet you, Ayesha!
Yes! Nice to meet you, too, guys!
